Q: What changes have occurred in my blood sugar management over the recent period, and is there an improvement or worsening trend?
What recent changes have occurred in my health, and what could be the possible reasons behind these changes?
Will my family history of diabetes have a long-term impact on my future health management?
Is my overall health management moving in a positive direction? In what areas can I further improve?
What progress have I made in adjusting my diet, and where do I still need to improve?
How can I balance maintaining a healthy diet while coping with external environments like social events or gatherings?
How have my diabetes-related symptoms (such as blurred vision, numbness in hands and feet, fatigue, etc.) changed over time, and do these suggest possible complications?
Has my physical condition (such as energy, physical strength, nerve function, etc.) changed over time, and could these changes be related to blood sugar fluctuations or diabetes management?
Has my medication management been stable over the past period, and have there been any instances of missed doses?
What suggestions has the AI assistant provided to maintain medication adherence and blood sugar monitoring habits?
After the adjustments made in recent days, do I still have a risk of developing diabetes?
